{{Lang|'''Nonno'''|ain=ノンノ}} is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] who appears at [[Tsurumi Island]] after the player completes the [[World Quest]] ''[[The Sun-Wheel and Mt. Kanna]]''.

==Location==
<gallery>
NPC Location Nonno 1.png|Nonno's initial location
NPC Location Nonno 1 Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Profile==
She is a long lost soul who likes to play hide and seek.

===Appearance===
Nonno is, like any other interactable lost soul on Tsurumi island, a light blue, almost transparent figure with a white, glowing point at the place of her heart. She doesn't have any limbs or any details on her face.
